description: If you liked Descent, then you'll love the previously unreleased footage on Disc Two, including the stunning 'Fantasy Montage,' which features footage of Aiden Shaw done up to resemble a Christ-like figure, Marcus Iron crawling seductively across the floor, some unseen sexual footage and additional cum shots, and lots of other gorgeous images, all captured in sumptuous videography unlike anything seen in adult entertainment before or since. But don't forget about the Cum Shot Compilation, Model Gallery and Bios, Action Gallery and the great Trailers for other Hot House titles. With so much additional material to offer, this special collector's edition of a true classic is an absolute must-own.
title: Descent
